---
output: pdf_document
---

```{r, echo = FALSE}

library(png)
library(ggplot2)
library(grid)

pic <- readPNG("../Figures/schema.png")

pic_grob <- rasterGrob(pic, interpolate = TRUE)

plt <- qplot(1:14, 1:14, geom = "blank") +
  annotation_custom(pic_grob,
                    xmin = -Inf,
                    xmax = Inf,
                    ymin = -Inf,
                    ymax = Inf) + 
  theme_void()

print(plt)

```
